headline: UBS hires tech bankers Larsen, Michlovich from BofA in New York
summary: NEW YORK (Reuters) -UBS hired two technology investment bankers in New York from Bank of America, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Thursday.  David Larsen will join the Swiss bank in September, to focus on application software, according to the memo by Laurence Braham, the global co-head of technology for UBS' investment bank.  "David and Rob collectively bring over 30 years of banking experience and have advised clients on numerous high-profile M&A and capital markets transactions," Braham wrote.

headline: Bank of America (NYSE:BAC) Appoints Gabby Hodgson as New Colorado President
summary: Bank of America (NYSE:BAC) has witnessed a price move of 8% over the past month, influenced by several key developments. The appointment of Gabby Hodgson as president for the Colorado market signifies a strategic leadership realignment. Additionally, the company’s recent redemption of CHF 0.2525% senior notes and enhanced cash back rewards offerings may have bolstered investor sentiment by showcasing active financial management and customer engagement efforts. These initiatives came amid...

headline: Oil Traders Flock to Niche Options Market to Bet on Glut
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Investors have ramped up wagers in a relatively obscure corner of the oil market that OPEC+ output hikes will lead to an eventual glut toward the end of this year and into 2026.
